name: Minimalist Resume Template w/ Auto Layout
description:
A resume template with auto layout! After all, who wants to figure out how to streamline their resume edits when finding a job is hard enough?


This layout practices the best principles for design so you don't have to worry about it! This includes auto layout so you can hide or add content as you please. There are text styles and color selections so you can simply switch colors within the palette or create your own aesthetic! Components make it easy to apply universal changes to multiple versions of your resume!


Not familiar with auto layout? Check out this short video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PNJxeD29ZTg
